name: Special Delivery Custom Night
description:
Special Delivery Custom Night is an Ultimate Custom Night fangame that specifically has FNAF AR animatronics! The game is being developed with FNAF Engine. It started out as a side project. But then I added a new animatronic. Then another animatronic. Then it became my current project. It has allowed me to come up with some new cool mechanics! I might even use some of them in FNAFX!

Freddy Frostbear: He will start in the Freezer. If he isn't there, shut the right door.

Shamrock Freddy: He will gradually approach your office from the Left hall. If hes right outside, shut the left door.

Chocolate Bonnie: He will approach you through the vents, you need to use the monitor to keep track of him! When hes outside of the vent door, shut it!

System Error Toy Bonnie: He will appear in your office. Put on the mask and he will leave!

Highscore Toy Chica: She will appear in your office. Put on the mask and she will leave!

VR Toy Freddy: He will appear in your office. Put on the mask and He wil leave!

Flaming Springtrap: He will approach you through the vents, you need to use the monitor to keep track of him! When hes outside of the vent door, shut it!

BlackHeart Bonnie: He will start on the stage. He will go off of the stage and vanish into a hole in the Dining Room. When he does, shut the right door.

Blackice Frostbear: He will start in the Kitchen. Once he disappears, shut the left door.

Firework Freddy: He will start in the Bathrooms and gradually walk through the hallway. Once hes close, shut the Right Door.

Liberty Chica: She will start in the Bathrooms. Once shes gone, play the music box to get her back!

Easter Bonnie: He will approach you through the vents. Once hes close on the radar, shut the vent door.

8-bit Baby: She will start in the Arcade area. If the screen on the Arcade isn't lit up, press 2 to get her back!

Freddy: He will start on the stage. If hes in the Closet, shut the Left door.

Bonnie: He will start in the Prize Corner. If hes not there, he is in your office but can only be seen with the Flashlight. Shine him to make him leave.

Chica: She will start in the kitchen. She will end your run if you don't keep the music box wound up.

Foxy: He will start in the Arcade then go to the Closet. If hes in the closet, shut the left door.

StupidPrizeLife - Lead Developer, Artist, Testing

StealthProductions - Created the idea

treefire33 - Testing

LightningAgamerA - Testing

TheFantasticAero - Ideas

PizzaSmuggler - Menu Theme

The FNAF Engine discord - Additional ideas
